description: Main frontend source code for a Flutter-based mobile finance tracking and budgeting app. Contains widget definitions, navigation, screens for login, registration, dashboard, transactions, budgets, and analytics, as well as layout and theme configurations.

classes.name: FinanceTrackerApp
classes.description: Root widget establishing theme and initial navigation to AuthNavigation.

classes.name: AuthNavigation
classes.description: Handles user authentication state and routes to Login/Register or main app.

classes.name: MainScaffold
classes.description: Main app container with bottom navigation for Dashboard, Transactions, Budgets, and Charts.

classes.name: LoginScreen
classes.description: UI for user login, including email/password input and login button.

classes.name: RegisterScreen
classes.description: UI for user registration with email/password and confirmation.

classes.name: DashboardScreen
classes.description: Displays recent transactions and a summary card, with navigation to add transactions.

classes.name: TransactionsScreen
classes.description: Lists all transactions, supports adding, editing, and deleting transactions.

classes.name: TransactionEditScreen
classes.description: Form for creating or editing a transaction, including date picker.

classes.name: BudgetsScreen
classes.description: Displays budget categories and limits, with refresh support.

classes.name: ChartsScreen
classes.description: Shows analytics and spending breakdown charts.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Constructs the widget tree for each widget class

methods.name: _checkAuth
methods.description: Checks authentication status during widget init

methods.name: _fetchTransactions
methods.description: Fetches all transactions for list display

methods.name: _pickDate
methods.description: Opens date picker dialog for transaction date selection
